meanings.definition: Opposed to or against the elite or ruling class.
meanings.sent1: The antielite group protested against the wealthy leaders.
meanings.sent2: She always spoke out against the elite, showing her antielite beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The antielite activists held a peaceful rally to challenge the powerful.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the hero's antielite stance led to a revolution.
meanings.sent5: The antielite movement gained momentum among the common people.

meanings.definition: A person or group that opposes or criticizes the elite or ruling class.
meanings.sent1: The antielite was vocal in their criticism of the ruling class.
meanings.sent2: Many see her as an antielite due to her constant challenges to authority.
meanings.sent3: The antielite's witty remarks about the elite always made people laugh.
meanings.sent4: He was a true antielite, always fighting for the rights of the common people.
meanings.sent5: The antielite group gained support from those tired of the ruling class's control.
